level.text: In conformance with ยง 3099.1 of this Title, the affected Advisory Neighborhood Commission (ANC) shall be granted party status to any application submitted pursuant to this chapter, and may participate in the public hearing for the application pursuant to ยง 3012.5 and 3012.6.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4804 (June 3, 2011).
